item.title: Memory/disk allocation of Cloud Foundry apps
item.description: With the help of the cf api, cf cli and jq one can pretty easily check the amount of memory/storage allocated for apps/containers deployed in CF: cf curl /v2/apps | jq '[.resources[].entity | \ select(.memory > 1) | \ {"mem": . | (.memory * .instances), \ "disk": . | (.disk_quota * .instances)}] | \ {"instances": map(.) | length, \ "mem_total": map(.mem) | add, \ "disk_total": map(.disk) | add}' { "instances": 5, "mem_total": 32768, "disk_total": 32768 } Values are in MB.
